summary: Redone red & green textures for apples.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/5901-1-1351448684.jpg[/img][/center]
I found myself getting tired of the food textures in Skyrim, so I\'m taking it upon myself to do a few miscellaneous items here and there.

These are the red and green apple textures. I wanted to brighten them up and make them more noticeably \"red\" and \"green\"... like a Granny Smith or a Red Delicious.

[u][b]Ver. 1.3:[/b][/u]
Fixed the stem on the green apple so it\'s no longer green, but a more natural brown \"woody\" stem.

[u][b]Ver. 1.2:[/b][/u]
Changed the texture of the green apple to a lighter green, to resemble something more realistic.

[u][b]Ver. 1.1:[/b][/u]
-Added the green apple retexture

[u][b]Other products to expect after kit is released:[/u][/b]
- Eye textures
- Hair meshes & textures
- Custom weapons & armor
- Clutter textures

Thanks and enjoy.
author: Tandellin
